评论概述: Flattering on Small or Round Face
评论详情: I usually look pretty bad in sunglasses because I have a small face. Most sunglasses are overpowering on my face or make it look too round or draw too much attention to my (aging) jawline. The oval shape is flattering on me. I really like how these sunglasses look on. They're also lightweight and comfortable. It's great to have two so I can wear a darker lens on the brightest days.

Y’all, these arrived right before I was about to shower, so I apologize for the greasy hair. I decided to go ahead and post these photos with my greasy hair and my acne breakout anyway to show just how glorious these sunglasses are… Like seriously, I’ve only got on a bit of eyebrow color and lip color, but these sunglasses have me sending hot girl energy, Hollywood vibes, femme fatale mood, etc. They’re a whole look in themselves, and you don’t even need any makeup or anything else because You’re going to feel automatically glammed up as soon as you put them on!  Pros: -great for wider faces/heads (a problem that I commonly have with sunglasses is that they make my head/face look even wider than it already is because the sunglasses won’t be wide enough for me, but this design is so appealing and perfect for my face shape + other sunglasses will start to give me a headache if they’re too small, but these are perfect!) -great for folks with low-set eyebrows (another common issue I have with sunglasses is that they totally conceal my eyebrows. I have really low set eyebrows, so this might not be a common issue for everyone. I’ve always wanted a pair of sunglasses where I could still show off my eyebrows while wearing the sunglasses, and these definitely deliver that for me.) -capable of multiple different retro/vintage looks (I feel like with a headscarf, these glasses are giving a beautiful 1960’s look, and without the scarf and with my hair in all it’s pre-shower greasy glory, it’s sending major 1990’s vibes)  Cons: -none yet that I can tell, but I’ll update my review if I notice anything.  In summation, I’m in love with these sunglasses. If you don’t have a pair of sunglasses like these already, and you love to play around with vintage fashion, then you have to get these!
